featured.text: Due to the unstable Republic of the Congo.
However, the plastic step-stool she had at home was unstable and cluttered up the small bathroom shared by her whole family.

definition.zh_def: 不穩定的，容易變化或崩潰的。
definition.en_def: Not stable; likely to change or fail suddenly.
definition.example: The weather has been unstable lately, with sudden storms and temperature drops.
